HI THERE!
 
Thank you so much for choosing our work. Just want to let you know that we are appreciated.

This package contains graphic sources for Chess characters plus 1 FREE background. All pivot is set. Prefab ready. Import package and you can use them right away.

Designed in Korean Shabu Shabu Theme by our talented intern. This asset gives you...

8 chess pieces: Pawn, Rook, Bishop, Knight, 2 Queens, 2 Kings
2 bases : gold pot and black pot
***Without animation***

==1 Prefab for each piece==
Prefab contains 2 objects: Body and Base
All layered by Z position.

FREE 1 Background
Shabu pot on the table with veggies and tofu.

PLUS original PSD file. Allow you to adapt, re-design, create more character.

=== Related Package ===
2D Chess Graphic Pack V.2 - Fantasy style

Please don’t forget to rate and comment on our work. Let us know if something is bad or need to be fixed. We also listening for your request is anything you want us to do next :}

Cheers,
